item.description:
Let's start the weekend early and check out Anthony from WHAT UP FUNK's new band CU3E...

CU3E is original funk/rock music featuring the power trio of David Loyd on bass and vocals, Victor Chiappetta on drums and vocals, Anthony David Gad on guitar and lead vocals
Bear and grill has offered meetup happy hour pricing for this event $3 beer/wine and 1/2 price appetizers. So come out and enjoy an awesome band plus save a few $$
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the bar area.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Let's Start the weekend early with CU3E @ Bear and Grill in Orange
